attributes.action: abolish interest on student loans until students have gained their qualifications
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to abolish interest being added to student loans until students have actually left university.  

Until graduation students have no hope of paying off student loans.  Students in general (and especially those on longer degree courses) are under increasing financial strain on leaving university.  Ever rising interest rates are adding thousands of pounds to the student loans before students have even gained their degrees.

Interest rates currently stand at 4.8% for student loans.
